title: Lebanese PM may cancel cabinet meeting; plans speech: party-linked website
text:
FILE PHOTO: Lebanese Prime Minister Saad al-HarirI is seen during the meeting to discuss a draft policy statement at the governmental palace in Beirut, Lebanon February 6, 2019. REUTERS/Aziz Taher

BEIRUT (Reuters) - Lebanese Prime Minister Saad al-Hariri may cancel Friday’s cabinet meeting amid nationwide protests against the government over an economic crisis, a website affiliated to his party said.

The news portal that represents Hariri’s Future Movement also said the prime minister would deliver a speech on the crisis.
description: Lebanese Prime Minister Saad al-Hariri may cancel Friday's cabinet meeting amid nationwide protests against the government over an economic crisis, a website affiliated to his party said.
